page.title: 06ANIMAL LIFE IN SHERIFFHALES
page.content: When we went to our trip we saw two animals.The first one was a mouse which we found as we were resting near a bus stop.We were just having a rest when one girl started to scream, our teacher came over."What's the matter?" he said."There is a mouse on my leg".Everybody crowded round to see the mouse.After that in Sheriffhales we saw a grey squirrel I didn't know it was going to be that small.It was coloured an orangy brown with flakes of grey.It was jumping around in the trees near the Sheriffhales church.It was a very quiet area so that must be why it lived there.
